General.Name: Bilia AB
General.Description: Bilia AB (publ) operates as a full-service supplier for car ownership in Sweden, Norway, Germany, Luxemburg, and Belgium. It operates through Services, Car, Fuel segments. The company provides service, repair, fuel, car wash, rental cars, car accessories, car care, paint work, windscreen replacements, car dismantling, and other services; and engages in the sale of new and used cars; transport vehicles and trucks; and offers financing, insurance, servicing, wheel storage, and other services. In addition, it offers workshop services, spare parts, wheel, damage, and glass centres, tyer sales, rim repair, car dismantling, store sales, and e-commerce services; and operates car ownership services, which provides washing and refueling services under the Tanka, OKQ8, and Tvätta brand. The company sells Volvo, BMW, MINI, Toyota, Lexus, Mercedes-Benz, Porsche, Volkswagen, Audi, Skoda, Seat, Cupra, Nissan, Jaguar, Land Rover, XPENG, ORA, Renault, Dacia och Alpine. Toyota, Mercedes-Benz, Volkswagen, Nissan och Renault as transport vehicles and Mercedes heavy trucks. Further, it operates two internet based auction sites; and sells its products through stores and online. The company was incorporated in 1967 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.
